name: views/itemfulfillment/assets
description: Item Fulfillment Assets Component Adds a sublist to Itemfulfillment that creates or updates Assets records from fulfilled Asset Items

properties.name: element.item
properties.description: Source the item from the transaction line. This is populated with script from the fulfilled line.

properties.name: element.serial
properties.description: Source the serial number from the transaction line. This is populated with script from the fulfilled line inventory detail.

properties.name: element.id
properties.description: Link to existing Asset record. This is populated with script when a matching Asset record is found.

properties.name: element.customer
properties.description: Sources the customer from the transaction body field.

properties.name: element.parent
properties.description: Sources the parent from the transaction body field.

properties.name: element.addressbook
properties.description: Source the address id from the transaction ship address.

properties.name: element.addresstext
properties.description: Source the address text from the transaction ship address text. When present, this is populated with script to format the address and remove the Attention and Addressee.

properties.name: error.required
properties.description: Alert text when an Asset does not have the require fields completed. The scope of this template is a hash of the missing required element name and labels.

properties.name: error.duplicate
properties.description: Alert text when the Asset line is not unique. The scope of this template is the duplicate line data.

members.name: hidden
members.description: This view is to be shown or hidden
